content: X-GR Grating clip with nail Directly fastened grating fastener ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Preassembled saddle for increased productivity – up to 120 fasteners per hour by one user with the fully automatic DX 460-GR nailer Two support legs provide 90° fastening for high application limit High productivity – can help to significantly reduce time and costs overall Duplex coating for greater corrosion protection Removable fastener suitable for various grating heights Applications Fastening grating to steel structures in mildly corrosive environments ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Grating Approvals: ITB For use with (tools): DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 Technical Data | Application | Grating | Approvals | ITB | For use with (tools) | DX 460, DX 5, DX 6 | Corrosion protection | Duplex coating, equivalent to 45 µm hot-dip galvanized | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor, Indoor environments with temporary condensation, Outdoor temporary applications, Outdoor, rural or urban environment with low pollution, Outdoor with moderate concentration of pollution | Minimum thickness of base material (steel) | 3/16 in | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2106416 - X-GR 1 1/4 CR20 P8 - Package Size 100 pc - 3497133 - Kit X-GR 1 1/4 + 6.8/11M black - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2400x X-GR 1 1/4 CR20 P8 - 2400x DX cartridge 6.8/11 M10 STD black - 2106417 - X-GR 35/40 CR20 P8 - Package Size 100 pc - 2106415 - X-GR 25/30 CR20 P8 - Package Size 100 pc
